descriptionHtml: Guys even though this is my frist mod I know it is really good just go to the skyforge and get the armor theres also a ring and a sword if you need to increase your one hand skill just go to a giants camp and use the sword and itll level you up while increase the skill thanks for downloading also I already bug fixed it about 20 times and tested it there should be no more probs.
author: Thegreatmods100
